name: Weirding Scroll
description: The Weirding Scroll is a tiny, unaligned construct that resembles a normal scroll and possesses unique magical abilities.
memorable: Its ability to dominate humanoids telepathically makes it a uniquely dangerous opponent despite its low physical capabilities.
goals: Typically aims to manipulate or control humanoids using its telepathic abilities.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other magical constructs or as a guardian for arcane treasures.
environment: Usually found in magical laboratories or arcane libraries.
strengths: Strong against poison and psychic damage, with high immunity to conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, significantly reducing its survivability.
attacks: Can dominate humanoids at a distance and use the Tendril of Light for psychic and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ability to dominate a humanoid telepathically for up to one hour.
senses: Possesses blindsight within a 60-foot radius, allowing it to detect creatures without sight.
skills: Skilled in deception, enabling effective trickery and manipulation.
additional_information: Immunities to various conditions make it durable against status effects.
Incapacitated in an antimagic field, limiting its effectiveness.
Has a false appearance ability to blend in as a normal scroll.
High intelligence indicating significant magical understanding.

construct with telepathic powers and false appearance
